about_the_game:
Unlock the full experience of Survive It: Frozen by purchasing this pack with the other four characters for the game.

With this DLC you can choose four new characters at the game start, to play in the game (multiplayer and singleplayer). Thanks to this DLC you can play Survive It: Frozen with completely new character combinations and try out different build orders, tailored to your selected characters.

The characters in this packs include:
  • The Doctor: A vulnerable but good supporting character that can heal other characters, place health booster kits and comes with a gathering speed upgrade.
  • The Soldier: A simple character who withstands more and fights well - that’s it. His upgrade allow him to place dynamte and blow up crates and other stuff on the map.
  • The Businesswoman: A character best used in the background: She can construct a trading tent that allows to trade food to/from wood, needs less food than the average character and has a powerful upgrade that makes the construction of all of your buildings cheapter.
  • The Farmer: An enduring character to boost your resource income during longer games. She can construct barns to train sheeps for food, place woodpiles to collect wood with the construction speed and has an upgrade to boost your construction speed.

  • The Businesswoman: A character best used in the background: She can construct a trading tent that allows to trade food to/from wood, needs less food than the average character and has a powerful upgrade that makes the construction of all of your buildings cheapter.
  • The Farmer: An enduring character to boost your resource income during longer games. She can construct barns to train sheeps for food, place woodpiles to collect wood with the construction speed and has an upgrade to boost your construction speed.
